attributes.action: Investigate which highways official approved simultaneous roadwords on the A1 and M1 in the same area of the Country clogging two of the major North/South routes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like downing street to investigate who authorised the Major road works in the same area of the country blocking the M1 and A1 at the same time. 

Surely any project manager should be in a position to identify the problems this causes and would be in a position to stagger the works.

A classic example of mismanagement at the cost of the consumer. Micro analysis of time wasted, excess fuel used and efficiency losses would reveal the actual cost of this Muppetry.
